flow.descriptionCdata:
f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.008742a0-cbe7-43b9-8b4c-6535adcb27b1.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.0f6b043a-6016-4bac-9bf9-c4070e495b4b.prompt=Process Instance ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.168307ce-26fa-4f6c-9943-864997649e2f.prompt=Component ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.1bd98831-0f24-4900-a441-e3dddef6af9f.prompt=Process Instance ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.370e5e67-6889-4a09-99bd-0fb90742b3be.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.3803d3d4-4258-403a-9f9d-fa99690a0863.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.4b3bbc99-976c-48cb-b68b-bd16e667ac7d.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.4bc09d01-db4a-40c8-a13f-0190f6ee7d2c.prompt=Component ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.4cee385a-9ee5-4765-b906-c48b4973b520.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.515827c9-b9ad-4b63-aa3e-ef62855df30a.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.5bf03e45-4edc-4414-a4e4-54a579968f0b.prompt=Process Instance ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.5ed69623-f7b4-49d1-92d8-baee41999a7e.description=
This workflow retrieves all the child components from the list of component ids.

Inputs\:

artifactIds		- List of component ids each separated by "," for which the child components will be retrieved
userIdentifier	- User Identifier to pass to the wrapper flow to retrieve the child components

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.6aefcb57-43ca-4b69-8380-e091f9be9b3c.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.6b834e35-c91b-46a3-9c67-84bc664c0799.prompt=Process Instance ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.6f4c6571-3fe9-49e9-8fc0-112abd84b816.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.6ff5ba91-3308-469c-83bd-3a87d9ebccf5.prompt=Component ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.753e2bfd-ca78-4dc3-8971-e1272c030529.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.758ab399-65a8-4cd8-a7f0-e0eed9dd05da.prompt=Artifact ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.78a2d64c-a0f4-49f1-bee5-20ce505fa33d.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.8c53da97-5be2-41a5-98d4-ff7f20b6fd59.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.92343f4b-6e88-4a6d-af62-87407af93a3e.prompt=User Identifier ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.95a09989-e211-43a9-a2fd-7ff646216053.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.9b1e6522-ed97-4460-903d-cc4b274f219a.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.9c2cc48f-d938-4d12-80ba-af7dfc8b4469.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.9e0f6fa0-1ac8-4da5-b0ba-b1c3200a7a04.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.c02194d4-58cf-475c-9442-22f7bcdfffe3.prompt=User Identifier f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.c678384f-f651-4347-9528-e4e57727f799.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.c80703ac-db62-46be-9d46-1d9d525e331c.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.d9e6aff3-82b8-4bdc-9f5f-a9ffee24c71d.prompt=Resource Provider ID f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.description=
This workflow performs Simple Compute Linux  Monitor Modify operation on the server identified by CSA Service Component.

Inputs\:

CSA_CONTEXT_ID 	\: CSA Context Id
CSA_PROCESS_ID 	\: CSA Process Instance Id
SVC_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
RSC_PROVIDER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL \: This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
RSC_POOL_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
SVC_INSTANCE_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
PRN_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
REQ_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
REQ_USER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
USR_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
RSC_BINDING_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

These tokens with the default values are resolved by CSA when the flow is invoked.

Responses\:
success 		\: Workflow completed successfully.
failure 		\: Something went wrong.
f682df87-31f2-4e52-95fe-21dfbaa4b719.edb343bf-6374-4b8d-a6d0-35319a310aee.prompt=Organization ID
flow.name: Simple Compute Linux Monitor - Modify
